mapper.update:
update trans_strategy_db
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content_check = #{contentCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT},
conflict_strategy = #{conflictStrategy,jdbcType=TINYINT},
content_check_size = #{contentCheckSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transmit_type = #{transmitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transmit_operation = #{transmitOperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation_name = #{operationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
security_rank = #{securityRank,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update trans_strategy_db set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_check = #{contentCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT}, conflict_strategy = #{conflictStrategy,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content_check_size = #{contentCheckSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transmit_type = #{transmitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transmit_operation = #{transmitOperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_name = #{operationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, security_rank = #{securityRank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from trans_strategy_db
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by gmt_create desc, id desc
select from trans_strategy_db where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select from trans_strategy_db where id in (select strategy_id from trans_busi_db where channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
